title: Reuse pseudocode tab when decompiling in IDA
content: When I press F5 in IDA to decompile, it always opens a new pseudocode tab, so over time many tabs open and I have to remember to close them. Can I make it so that F5 reuses an already open tab instead of opening a new one?

answers_data.content: Press TAB instead of F5 to re-use the previous pseudocode tab rather than opening a new one.
